title: Why no Lore?
body:
When are the people who enjoy the lore going to get more? The 3 sentence champion bios suck and the fact that older champions lores have been chapped from interesting stories to brief synopses is sort of sad. There's been no web comics, no graphic novels, novels, ect. I feel like with how popular League is and how popular these forms of entertainment are becoming (DC and Marvel are doing well), I don't see why this hasn't been explored. 

I feel like a lot of players personally become invested with some of the characters and would like to see more of them outside of the game.

replies.body: Who has time to read fictional histories in a video game, shm....

It's a hobby. You may find it pointless, but other people find it enjoyable. One could ask you the same thing. Why do you play LoL in your free time? Likewise, some people enjoy to read lore in their free time.
